section_title: AGENDA ITEM 8 - ARRANGEMENTS FOR THE FINANCIAL MECHANISM
sentences: The Co-Chair invited comments on the draft decisions in A/AC.237/WG.II/L.10 on modalities, A/AC.237/WG.II/L.11 on policy guidance, and A/AC.237/WG.II/L.13 on temporary arrangements between the GEF and the Committee.
enb_long_title: Eleventh Session of The INC for the Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
